Description:
An Entertainer with Appeal For All
Set on a sprawling block and showcasing exceptional views, this spotless family home presents peaceful yet practical family living. Enhanced by fresh paint and polished floorboards, the generous open plan combines with a spacious covered deck to allow for true relaxation and easy entertaining. With a paved BBQ area and in-ground pool, your summers here will be just as comfortable as the cozy winters spent in the homes radiant interiors. Conveying a welcoming air sure to attract a variety of buyers, it features:
*Stylish kitchen complete with ss appls
*Bright bedrooms with BIR
*Contemporary bathroom; 2x Split System AC
*Chute to lower level laundry; 905SQM block approx
*Large dbl garage & workshop; sub-floor storage
* Leafy locale near shops & quality private schools

Description:
Auction this Saturday" Quality Modern Living in Inviting Bush Setting
Integrating presentation and location, this substantial north facing family home enjoys sensational bush surrounds nestled in a quiet cul de sac. A splendid mix of casual and formal spaces provides this elegant abode with its easy family-living feel. All 4 bedrooms, Master with WIR and palatial designer ensuite, plus a study nook and renovated family bathroom boasting Caesarstone vanity, are tucked away upstairs. On the lower level a large Lounge perfect for family movie nights and a study/home office are separate from main living. There's no doubting that the heart beats in the impressive Kitchen fully appointed with stone waterfall benchtop, 5 burner s/s oven and integrated dishwasher, along with the merging Dining and Family Living spaces (OFP). Glass doors open to an alfresco covered deck for BBQs with friends and an open pergola for enjoying the sunshine in the privacy of your tree lined allotment. Close to reputable schools including Yarra Road P.S, Good Shepherd P.S, Luther S.C and Yarra Valley Grammar. Minutes to Hochkins Reserve, Kelly Brook Winery and buses. A short drive to MacAdam Square shops and Eastlink. Boasting extra features including GDH, evaporative cooling, powder room, ample storage, intercom, 2 x double garages with rear access for boat or caravan.
Land: 725 sq. metres approx.

Description:
ENJOY THE CONVENIENCE AND THE EASY LIFESTYLE
A short stroll up the street and you have the convenience of Exeter Road shopping centre at your fingertips, with Chirnside Park just five minutes drive down the road, as well as nearby bus links that will take you where you need to go.
This is the ideal home for anyone seeking a property that won't take up too much of your time with garden maintenance, and being surrounded by neighbouring homes in the same complex, means that it's ideal for retirees who still want independence and a social element in their days. It's just as suitable for first or second home buyers and investors.
There are built in robes in all three bedrooms, an en suite affect bathroom, separate lounge room, pristine vinyl wrap kitchen and adjoining family/meals area and a sunny deck outside.
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a double garage with access to the rear yard provide those necessary essentials to make life that little bit more comfortable.

Description:
Step Up to a Beautiful Family Lifestyle
If you have any enquiries please contact Jo Parker on 0438 905 957; so you don't miss out this fantastic family home. Imagine a beautifully renovated family retreat that offers you a spacious 4 bedroom 2 bathroom design and an in-ground pool. Enjoy all this and more in this fashionable weatherboard home. It's set on about 839 sqm. in a premier no-through road, close to Warrien Reserve. You'll be captivated by the mountain views, picket fence and pretty landscaped garden. The sun-kissed interior showcases French doors, high ceilings, hardwood polished floorboards and contemporary carpets (1 year old). Discover the practicality of 4 good-sized bedrooms (robed), and a luxurious character-style bathroom with heritage claw foot bath. Parents have a private master suite featuring a vogue ensuite, newly fitted WIR and French doors opening to deck. Delight in effortless living and entertaining with two spacious living areas and a gourmet kitchen fitted with s/s Euro appliances and dishwasher. The elegant formal lounge room is warmed by an open fireplace, while the big family/meals room has a wood fire heater and double French door access to a stunning, roofed entertainer's deck. Kick back in style, or enjoy hours of family fun in the solar heated, salt-chlorinated in-ground pool. A paved barbeque area and private, child-friendly landscaped garden adds the finishing touch. Appointments: ducted heating (2 years old), evaporative cooling, shed and double carport with gated backyard access. All this and a prized location close to bus, shops, kinder, Luther College, Primary schools, reserves and EastLink - be quick!
Jo Parker : 0438 905 957

Description:
Polished to Perfection
Renovated to perfection, this beautiful home is ready for you to enjoy, whether you're a First Homebuyer, Investor or Downsizer. It's on its own title, with no body corp, and offers you total convenience, a short walk from shops and transport. You'll love the appeal of the long front deck and pristine landscaped garden, while the freshly painted, sun-filled interior makes a statement with newly polished hardwood floorboards, new downlights and contemporary decor. Life will be a breeze with the large gourmet timber kitchen/meals area showcasing new s/s appliances and s/s splashbacks. Kick back in the comfort of the spacious and elegant lounge room, featuring a decorative open fireplace. Two private king-sized bedrooms boast BIRs and air-conditioning; bedroom 2 has overhead storage. Complementing these is a deluxe bathroom and powder room. When you see the large undercover entertaining area, and the trendy, fuss-free landscaped garden, you'll know that easy outdoor living is assured. Appointments: ducted heating, split system cooling, workshop/shed, water storage, off street parking and x-large carport. Walk to shops, bus, Hochkins Ridge Reserve, kinder and Village School Primary; close to EastLink. Not a cent to spend be quick!

Address: Unit 8, 8 KARINGAL STREET CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Young & Contemporary, with all the Mod Cons
At only 18 months young, this beautiful 2-storey townhouse offers you the finest in contemporary living and location convenience. It's privately set at the rear of a smart block and is perfect for Retirees, Professionals, Investors or First Homebuyers. From here, you're just a short walk from shops, bus, kinder and Village School Primary. Enhanced by high ceilings, the sun-kissed interior is dressed to impress with stunning hardwood floorboards and modern window furnishings. You'll love all the creature comforts as well: internal access double garage (space for a workshop), fully insulated, ducted heating and water storage. Enjoy a spacious, practical layout showcasing a CaesarStone kitchen resplendent with s/s Euro appliances and glass splashbacks. The family/meals room opens to the easy-care landscaped garden; for seamless indoor/outdoor living. The lounge room is also an inviting space. Discover 3 double bedrooms (BIRs, 2 with views of the Dandenongs), a luxurious family bathroom (floor-to-ceiling tiles) and powder room. The big master suite is privately zoned downstairs and boasts an ensuite. Nothing to do, except enjoy. Close to Luther College, Warrien Reserve, Oxley College and Chirnside shopping act now!

Description:
Picture Perfect Appeal
Situated in a tranquil pocket of Croydon North, this immaculately presented home takes pride of place on a corner block surrounded by beautifully lush gardens.
This home has been fastidiously cared for by one owner and presents a wonderful opportunity for low maintenance and easy living. Showcasing a flowing floorplan, the home comprises a formal lounge & entry and light filled family & kitchen area. The spacious master bedroom is complemented by walk in robes and an ensuite effect bathroom which also services the two other bedrooms.
The centrally positioned kitchen boasts generous cupboard space, electric oven, dishwasher and with the family area adjacent that opens to a wonderful decked area, you can entertain in style.
Featuring all the comforts you could desire including gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large double garage with remote and additional loft storage.
Step outside into the low maintenance backyard and relax on the private fully covered deck or enjoy watching your vegetables grow in the established gardens.
Situated in a brilliant locale close to shops, transport and local schools, this fabulous home offers a lifestyle of comfort and convenience and will suit a range of potential purchasers including first home buyers, small families, investors and those looking to downsize.

Description:
More Value than Most
Once you discover how spacious, private and convenient this modern 2-storey house is, you'll feel like you've found your dream home. It's ideal for First Homebuyers, Young Families or Investors and is set in a no-through road in the exclusive Birts Hill precinct. You can walk to McAdam Square shops, transport, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar, reserves and Luther College, while EastLink is handy too. Easy to live in or rent out now, the interior is enhanced by high ceilings and modern dcor, including contemporary flooring. Three double bedrooms (robed, 2 with air-conditioning) are serviced by a family bathroom. The private master is on its own level and features an ensuite, ceiling fan and WIR. Bedroom 3 is enormous and has beautiful treed views. You could use it as a rumpus/2nd living area if you wish. The living spaces are also on a separate level and comprise a smart open plan kitchen fitted with Chef appliances. A large lounge/dining room invites relaxation and opens to a huge tiered deck (partly covered); for effortless all-seasons' entertaining. With a private treed outlook, the refreshed landscaped backyard has plenty of space for children to play. Appointments: ducted heating and double carport. Fantastic value act now!

Description:
Contemporary Finesse with Northerly Aspect
Sophisticated with modern lines and a sleek shimmering interior, this outstanding architecturally custom designed new home showcases incomparable luxury and doubles as a retreat with multiple pockets to recline, entertain and enjoy a totally private indoor outdoor lifestyle with superb northerly orientation. 3 Bedrooms and 2 bathrooms capture views of the idyllic garden, Master complete with Retreat and designer WIR and ensuite. Light and airy floor spaces culminate in the open plan sun soaked Living/Dining and executive Kitchen, equipped with s/s Euro appliances and Caesarstone benchtops. A secure low maintenance landscaped rear yard with stunning wrap around deck provides the home with a chic finish and distant tranquil views of the Dandenong Ranges. Only a street away from Yarra Road P.S and in close proximity to Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, several shopping precincts, Candlebark Walk and Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve. Buses with connections to Croydon and Ringwood are in easy reach with seamless Eastern Freeway/Eastlink access. Further appointments include: split system heating/cooling, double glazed windows, powder room, exceptional interior storage, under house storage, water tank and double remote garage.
Land: 373 sq. metres approx.

Address: 77 Bonnie View Road Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
All the elements of perfect family home
Designed to accommodate vibrant family life, this brick veneer home offers zoned living with spacious formal and informal living areas, all tucked away on a huge family friendly block. With floor to ceiling windows, the inviting formal lounge is bathed in natural light, the perfect place to unwind in front of the cosy open fire. At the hub of the home is a beautiful open kitchen with white Shaker style cabinetry opening to a spacious living/dining zone complete with super-warm gas log fireplace. Further accommodation includes 4 bedrooms (the spacious master wing has ensuite, a wall of built-in robes and parents retreat) and central family bathroom, and a large covered deck overlooking the private low maintenance rear garden. Additional features include European laundry, polished timber floors, reverse cycle air-conditioners, ceiling fans, a 2.6kw solar power system that returns to the grid in summer and winter, water tank, 2 sheds, under-house storage, double garage and carport. With easy access to schools and a short walk to the kindergarten and shops, this has all the elements for the perfect family home. Arrange an inspection today.

Description:
Stylish & Well Located
Sale by Set Date 28/5/2013
This beautifully styled 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home ticks all the boxes for effortless living, location and convenience.
You will be impressed by the modern tones and abundant windows that draw in natural light - a fusion of light and space combined to deliver an exceptional living experience.
The well equipped kitchen comprises large walk-in pantry, dishwasher, breakfast bar, gas cooking, generous sized meals area and is finished with dado wall panelling to enhance the room even further.
The master bedroom features a walk-in robe and full ensuite, the second bedroom has triple built-in robes whilst the third and fourth bedrooms provide double built-in robes - all serviced by a bright bathroom with new vanity and the highly functional laundry includes bench and built-in cupboards.
Step outside onto the covered patio, perfect for outdoor entertaining and beautifully finished with an airy pitched roof that extends out to a large sun deck - a serene spot to relax while the kids play in the spacious backyard.
The home is finished with delightful inclusions such as gas ducted heating, down lights, tiled entrance hall, mains gas barbeque, shed and double carport with plenty of clearance for caravan, furthermore, the home has been recently painted and fitted with new carpet throughout.
Set on a large 857m2 (approx) allotment in a quiet court location, this is a fabulous home for a young family in a location that's only a short walk to plaza shops, and handy to Luther College, McAdams Square shops, transport and EastLink. Every corner of this sparkling home is beautifully finished and thoughtfully designed to ensure a carefree lifestyle.
Proudly marketed by Barry Plant Real Estate Croydon
For further information contact Maree Slade 0419 519 282 or mslade@barryplant.com.au
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
Time to Upgrade Your Family Lifestyle?
Upgrade your family lifestyle and enjoy extra space, functionality and beautiful outdoor living in this contemporary 2-storey sanctuary. It's set on a corner block of about 863 sqm, in a tightly-held family neighbourhood, with dual driveway entry from Baringa Rd. A high fence and a beautiful native landscaped garden with a gazebo, creates a private, useable space for children and adults alike. Imagine the ease of 4-car accommodation, and a stylish interior enhanced by high ceilings. Four double bedrooms (robed, ceiling fans) and 2 bathrooms will also impress. Two bedrooms and one bathroom are zoned upstairs, along with a super-sized rumpus room. It's a perfect space for children, teens or parties, and opens to a merbau deck showcasing stunning views of Mt Dandenong and the trees.
Discover a renovated, classic-style kitchen/meals area fitted with quality s/s appliances, glass splashbacks and walk-in pantry. Parents can relax beside the gas log fireplace in the privacy of the big lounge/dining room (screening blinds). A huge new roofed alfresco area is framed by stacked stone walls for fashionable 'all-seasons' entertaining. Plus budget-friendly solar power, and appointments: remote x-large DLUG (space for a workshop, rear access), double carport, gas heating, 2 air-con's (one reverse cycle), gas log fireplace and water storage. Superbly sited; close to bus, kinder, Luther College, Primary schools, Warrien Reserve, Croydon North Plaza and EastLink. A must-see!
Jo Parker : 0438 905 957

Description:
Contemporary Family Lifestyle
Live a beautiful lifestyle with this stylishly rendered retreat. Ready for your enjoyment, it's love at first sight with the contemporary facade and superbly styled interior.
Be welcomed by polished timber floors, high ceilings and a family friendly floor plan.
Enjoy the ease of 4 spacious bedrooms, serviced by a deluxe family bathroom with double vanity. Parents have a private master suite with vogue ensuite (double shower) and walk in robe.
You will love the elegant lounge with gas log fire for formal entertaining, plus for casual living enjoy the spacious open plan family wing.
The stunning chef's kitchen boasts premium stainless steel appliances, ceasar stone benchtops and spacious dining.
Entertainers will love the fashionable al-fresco area complete with bistro blinds for all seasons, plus there's a spa pool and spacious lawn area for children to play.
Extras include ducted heating & cooling, quality furnishings and fittings, landscaped gardens, remote garage and workshop. The brilliant location close to quality schools, transport and Mcadam square, parks and reserves makes this a must see!

Description:
Development Bonanza - 6 Unit Site (STCA)
Attention Developers, Investors and Builders, are you looking for your next project? You could build 6 new units (STCA) on this premium block of approx. 1810 sqm. It's in a superb location, close to childcare, schools, transport and shops. Privately set back from the highway, with easy access via the service road, the existing 3 bedroom 2 bathroom weatherboard home has seen better days and is ready for you to knock down.
Water and gas are connected. This fantastic block is nestled in a picturesque, treed pocket highly sought by families and homebuyers near Bonnie View Rd and the beautiful Warrien Reserve. The childcare centre is right next door, while kindergarten and a host of quality government and private schools are nearby, including: Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Village Primary School, Croydon Hills Primary, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary and Oxley College. Croydon North Plaza is the local shopping strip, and you're only minutes from McAdam Square shops, Croydon Central, Eastland and Chirnside shopping.
Bus stop is near the corner, Croydon station is handy, and it's an easy 30 minute (approx.) commute to the CBD or beach on EastLink. Drive 30 minutes (approx.) the other way along the highway and you'll find the delights of the Yarra Valley. This is an outstanding opportunity on more than 1/3 acre - you'll need to be quick.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
BALI BEAUTIFUL
From the tropics of beautiful Bali, to a backyard setting that takes you back there, this inspiring home is blissful, inviting and has that little something special about it. Inside maintains its family character, splashing around with warm hues, high ceilings and a combination of carpets in the formal lounge room and the natural appeal of Hardwood timber floors in the dining room and in the family/meals area. There are 3 or 4 bedrooms, of which one can easily be utilised as a study or 4th bedroom. A huge walk in robe and en suite bathroom gives an element of surprise with its expansive proportions; it's a haven away from the rest of the home, fitted with a corner spa bath, separate shower and vanity. The family bathroom is spotlessly presented with a shower, bath and separate 2nd toilet. When finding your inner goddess, there's all the creature comforts in the kitchen to make cooking or entertaining enjoyable, including stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, glass splash-backs and a modern impression. Taking the traditional Balinese style of incorporating wood into their outdoor settings, the huge entertaining area in the backyard is built with high pitched ceilings, beautiful timber flooring, a 8pp spa with an inbuilt TV and lush tropical plantations to complete the intended picture. Furthermore, the location is just as an impressive highlight, set in a court, and is close to quality schools, McAdam shops and bus services. Extras include: ducted heating, AC, garden sheds and a double garage.
Insights: 6 Ambon Rise, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

STYLISH LIVING IN THE PERFECT LOCALE!
This superb three bedroom single level federation style home has all the luxuries and comforts you will ever need. Situated in a quality built estate which offers tranquil surroundings and lush green landscaped gardens.
Tastefully presented in neutral tones and offers a flowing open plan design.
Quality carpets, tiling and fixtures & fittings throughout.
Generous sized living & dining area leading out to private rear courtyard with secure double lock up garage.
Modern kitchen with European appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard and bench space.
Three generous bedrooms fitted with spacious built-in-robes and are serviced by a spacious en-suite bathroom.
Large central bathroom with bath & shower.
Reverse Cycle heating & cooling throughout
Move straight in and find peace of mind in this fully maintained estate and enjoy a low maintenance lifestyle.
The estate backs on to Warren Reserve so you can take advantage of its serene landscapes and walking tracks.
Driving into the city will be a breeze with Eastlink just moments away.

Description:
CLICK ON VIRTUAL TOUR FOR MORE
Set over two acres of serene bushland and highlighted by immaculate domains that flow seamlessly with its natural surrounds, this truly spectacular home epitomises modern family living. Custom designed and built in 2008 by Genjusho Building Design, it showcases a contemporary aesthetic featuring 25SQM(approx) of living space intelligently zoned over three levels finished with premium fixtures including Messmate and Tasmanian Oak floorboards, stainless steel appliances and Caesar stone benches. Featuring light-filled open plan kitchen, dining and living and a home theatre, it offers a suitable retreat whilst its four bedrooms main with ensuite and private balcony, and two bathrooms plus study offer comfort and flexibility. Beautifully completed with an impeccable outdoor area, the expansive Merbau deck provides an ideal setting for relaxing or entertaining courtesy of the exceptional sweeping views. Runner up at the HIA 2009/2010 awards in the Custom Built Home category, this is a unique opportunity to live in style and complete tranquillity. Also features:
*Caesar stone benches; SS appls; Walk in pantry; Ensuite
*Polished floorboards; Walk in robes & built in robes
*Wood fire heater, gas ducted heating & refrigerated cooling
*Double carport; Water tank; Balcony
*Close to Croydon station & Yarra Valley Grammar
*Backs on to Birts Hill Reserve, near to local shops
